title: iRobot Home - Cloud API to Robot Control
description: Chained vulnerabilities discovered via mobile app reverse engineering

steps.description: Reverse engineered iRobot Home app to discover cloud API endpoints
steps.outcome: Cloud API endpoints and status endpoint discovered

steps.description: Test status endpoint for information disclosure
prerequisites: Cloud API endpoints and status endpoint discovered

steps.description: Discover cloud API base URL and endpoints from Java code
steps.outcome: Cloud API base URL and endpoints identified

steps.description: Test cloud API for authentication bypass or weak authentication
prerequisites: Cloud API base URL and endpoints identified
steps.outcome: Unauthorized access to robot control API achieved

steps.description: Execute unauthorized robot commands (start, stop, schedule)
prerequisites: Unauthorized access to robot control API achieved

context: iRobot Home robot vacuum control application
